original:
Hey, I'm not exactly sure how
to word this, but...
I feel like the moment you saved
the Digital World...
Wasn't when the Selectors begun
their attack.
I wonder if, ever since you guys
came to this world...
Some big changes happened.
translation:
Hey, I'm not exactly sure how
to word this, but...
I feel like the moment you saved
the Digital World...
Wasn't when the Selectors begun
their attack.
I wonder if, ever since you guys
came to this world...
Some big changes happened.

original:
You protected everyone from the
Selectors' attack.
But if you put it that simply, 

Doesn't that imply only the people 
in the Colosseum were saved...?
But what I think is that, not only 
did you save the Digital World,
But I believe you also saved the
Selectors.
translation:
You protected everyone from the
Selectors' attack.
But if you put it that simply, 

Doesn't that imply only the people 
in the Colosseum were saved...?
But what I think is that, not only 
did you save the Digital World,
But I believe you also saved the
Selectors.

original:
I already know that you're a 
Legend Tamer,
But way before you officially
received that rank at the Colossem,
You were already our legend,
^P.
translation:
I already know that you're a 
Legend Tamer,
But way before you officially
received that rank at the Colossem,
You were already our legend,
^P.

original:
^P♪

Everyone's praising you as a god-
like Tamer for saving the world!
Should I start referring to you as
our savior?
...That face you're making leads
me to believe I shouldn't do that.
translation:
^P♪

Everyone's praising you as a god-
like Tamer for saving the world!
Should I start referring to you as
our savior?
...That face you're making leads
me to believe I shouldn't do that.

original:
Hey, ^P, I heard this
from Gatomon...
They said you received a message
from the new Tamer Union.
They want you to participate at the
Colosseum again, it seems.
Saying the battle will allow you to
become a Legend Tamer, but...
...Doesn't that sound kinda weird?
After all...
Aren't you already a legendary 
Tamer, ^P?
translation:
Hey, ^P, I heard this
from Gatomon...
They said you received a message
from the new Tamer Union.
They want you to participate at the
Colosseum again, it seems.
Saying the battle will allow you to
become a Legend Tamer, but...
...Doesn't that sound kinda weird?
After all...
Aren't you already a legendary 
Tamer, ^P?

original:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer, ^P♪
Now no one can deny you're a
legendary Tamer!
Though of course, everyone at the
Base already thought as much♪
translation:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer, ^P♪
Now no one can deny you're a
legendary Tamer!
Though of course, everyone at the
Base already thought as much♪

original:
All the Digimon have taken to calling
you their savior, ^P.
But I think that's a good thing,
don't you?
Though when it comes to Hiroyuki...

He's been referring to you as a
'Sailor' the whole time, huh?
translation:
All the Digimon have taken to calling
you their savior, ^P.
But I think that's a good thing,
don't you?
Though when it comes to Hiroyuki...

He's been referring to you as a
'Sailor' the whole time, huh?

original:
You were asked to participate in
the Legend Tamer battle?
If you don't know about it, go ask
Terriermon for the details.
translation:
You were asked to participate in
the Legend Tamer battle?
If you don't know about it, go ask
Terriermon for the details.

original:
So you're a Legend Tamer...
You're amazing, ^P!
I guess there's no other rank
higher than Legend, huh?
Like... God Tamer, or
Heaven Tamer...?
... I feel like no Tamer could
achieve such a rank.
translation:
So you're a Legend Tamer...
You're amazing, ^P!
I guess there's no other rank
higher than Legend, huh?
Like... God Tamer, or
Heaven Tamer...?
... I feel like no Tamer could
achieve such a rank.

original:
Have you already visited Archive
Island?
Did you find the large hole over
at Risk Factory?
You can get to an underground 
cavern called Risk Cave that way♪
translation:
Have you already visited Archive
Island?
Did you find the large hole over
at Risk Factory?
You can get to an underground 
cavern called Risk Cave that way♪

original:
If you go left in Risk Cave, you'll
reach Class Desert,
And if you go right, you'll run into
Chrome Mine♪
translation:
If you go left in Risk Cave, you'll
reach Class Desert,
And if you go right, you'll run into
Chrome Mine♪

original:
You did it, ^P!
Congratulations♪
This means you're a legendary
Tamer now, right?
translation:
You did it, ^P!
Congratulations♪
This means you're a legendary
Tamer now, right?

original:
Oh, it's our savior!
...Hehehe!
While everyone's decided to start
calling you that...
Somehow, it just feels kinda odd♪
translation:
Oh, it's our savior!
...Hehehe!
While everyone's decided to start
calling you that...
Somehow, it just feels kinda odd♪

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!

original:
Legend Tamer ^P!
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!♪
translation:
Legend Tamer ^P!
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!♪

original:
Oh, ^P!
We meet again!
Have you been using the Farm
Goods I gave you?
I'm always here, so just ask if
you need anything!
translation:
Oh, ^P!
We meet again!
Have you been using the Farm
Goods I gave you?
I'm always here, so just ask if
you need anything!

original:
Digimon of the same species have
different personalities, you know.
translation:
Digimon of the same species have
different personalities, you know.

original:
Whoa, ^P!

This Golden Apple is so delicious it
feels like my teeth'll break!
I better head to a dentist!

See you around!
translation:
Whoa, ^P!

This Golden Apple is so delicious it
feels like my teeth'll break!
I better head to a dentist!

See you around!

original:
Like I said, I don't have any fun
facts for you!
translation:
Like I said, I don't have any fun
facts for you!

original:
Thank you for your help,
^P.
Our family is carefree like always,
but I'm feeling tired.
I think I'm gonna take a rest here
for a little while.
translation:
Thank you for your help,
^P.
Our family is carefree like always,
but I'm feeling tired.
I think I'm gonna take a rest here
for a little while.

original:
It seems like Ancient Digimon have
started to appear, again.
This is... all thanks to you, isn't it,
^P?
translation:
It seems like Ancient Digimon have
started to appear, again.
This is... all thanks to you, isn't it,
^P?

original:
^P... I came here to 
soothe my soul...
Please talk with me regularly, 
okay...?
translation:
^P... I came here to 
soothe my soul...
Please talk with me regularly, 
okay...?

original:
I think I'm pretty cool with all these
bandages wrapped around me.
translation:
I think I'm pretty cool with all these
bandages wrapped around me.

original:
Isn't it about time I become able
to fly in the sky?
translation:
Isn't it about time I become able
to fly in the sky?

original:
Battles sure are fun!
But don't get careless!
translation:
Battles sure are fun!
But don't get careless!

original:
It's finally done, zansu!
...Or so I thought, but not yet!
translation:
It's finally done, zansu!
...Or so I thought, but not yet!

original:
What? What do you want?

Is it really strange for me to be
here?
It's because I'm so happy!
I really am!
Heheh, why don't you give it a try?
translation:
What? What do you want?

Is it really strange for me to be
here?
It's because I'm so happy!
I really am!
Heheh, why don't you give it a try?

original:
GranDracmon is over at Wizard's
Temple.
But I'm gonna Digivolve using my
own strength!
translation:
GranDracmon is over at Wizard's
Temple.
But I'm gonna Digivolve using my
own strength!

original:
Hey, ^P!
Great work!
I've also been training ever since
then!
There's still a lot to do!
Let's both work hard!
translation:
Hey, ^P!
Great work!
I've also been training ever since
then!
There's still a lot to do!
Let's both work hard!

original:
My name, Corona, is all about
light, you know?
translation:
My name, Corona, is all about
light, you know?

original:
I'd like to return this shotgun soon,
but...
translation:
I'd like to return this shotgun soon,
but...

original:
Oh, ^P, Have you been 
collecting Bug Plates?
I heard you can find Susanoomon's
Warp Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Rookie stage
Digimon to find it though...
translation:
Oh, ^P, Have you been 
collecting Bug Plates?
I heard you can find Susanoomon's
Warp Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Rookie stage
Digimon to find it though...

original:
Haha! ^P! Here's some
good information for you!
I heard you can find Chaosmon's
Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Champion 
stage Digimon to find it though...
translation:
Haha! ^P! Here's some
good information for you!
I heard you can find Chaosmon's
Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Champion 
stage Digimon to find it though...

original:
You saved the Digital World all by
yourself?
You beat the Selectors, their boss,
and even the Bandits...
I guess there's no more bad guys
left in the world, huh?
translation:
You saved the Digital World all by
yourself?
You beat the Selectors, their boss,
and even the Bandits...
I guess there's no more bad guys
left in the world, huh?

original:
If you're having trouble finding any
people to battle with,
Why don't you go and challenge 
that old pervert Entendel?
translation:
If you're having trouble finding any
people to battle with,
Why don't you go and challenge 
that old pervert Entendel?

original:
Legend Tamer?
Is that even a Tamer Rank?
Heh... I'm sure the older Tamers
have heard of it...
But this is the first time I've heard
about it. Congratulations♪
translation:
Legend Tamer?
Is that even a Tamer Rank?
Heh... I'm sure the older Tamers
have heard of it...
But this is the first time I've heard
about it. Congratulations♪

original:
Oh! If it isn't the savior of the
Digital World!
translation:
Oh! If it isn't the savior of the
Digital World!

original:
You're entering the Legend Tamer
battle?
Look, I know you're a good Tamer,
^P, but...
I can't really say YOU come to 
mind when I hear Legend Tamer.
Very few Tamers in history have
ever reached such a rank...
It's a rank for Tamers who are
basically living legends, you know?
translation:
You're entering the Legend Tamer
battle?
Look, I know you're a good Tamer,
^P, but...
I can't really say YOU come to 
mind when I hear Legend Tamer.
Very few Tamers in history have
ever reached such a rank...
It's a rank for Tamers who are
basically living legends, you know?

original:
Whoa... You're a legit Legend
Tamer...?!
I really don't know how to even
react to that.
Whether to laugh or not,
to be happy, surprised, or both.
It's a weird feeling, having 
someone I know become a legend...
.........
Anyway, congratulations!
I really don't have anything else
I can say.
translation:
Whoa... You're a legit Legend
Tamer...?!
I really don't know how to even
react to that.
Whether to laugh or not,
to be happy, surprised, or both.
It's a weird feeling, having 
someone I know become a legend...
.........
Anyway, congratulations!
I really don't have anything else
I can say.

original:
I heard that the Selectors were
defeated, but...
Did you really do it all by yourself?
I really cannot believe it...
translation:
I heard that the Selectors were
defeated, but...
Did you really do it all by yourself?
I really cannot believe it...

original:
Even the Gold and Silver Tamers
were kidnapped...
Utterly destroyed...
Just what on earth are you...?
The World Champion and a
Platinum Tamer?
I see... When you said that,
I understood it clearly.
You're the best Tamer in the
Digital World♪
translation:
Even the Gold and Silver Tamers
were kidnapped...
Utterly destroyed...
Just what on earth are you...?
The World Champion and a
Platinum Tamer?
I see... When you said that,
I understood it clearly.
You're the best Tamer in the
Digital World♪

original:
Legend Tamer?!
What?! Really?!
Someone so young is already a
Legend Tamer?!
While I acknowledge your strength,
by referring to you like that...
Isn't it a little grown up?
translation:
Legend Tamer?!
What?! Really?!
Someone so young is already a
Legend Tamer?!
While I acknowledge your strength,
by referring to you like that...
Isn't it a little grown up?

original:
Thank you, ^P,
I received a message earlier,
From our Ace, as well as the
Rookie.
They wanted to thank you for
saving them, ^P.
translation:
Thank you, ^P,
I received a message earlier,
From our Ace, as well as the
Rookie.
They wanted to thank you for
saving them, ^P.

original:
While Ace and the Rookie won't
be battling,
They said they'll be waiting to see
you at the Colosseum.
Seems they want to see you reach
Legend Tamer rank♪
translation:
While Ace and the Rookie won't
be battling,
They said they'll be waiting to see
you at the Colosseum.
Seems they want to see you reach
Legend Tamer rank♪

original:
Oh my, you made it so far...

To become a Legend Tamer...
I've never seen one before.
I thought it was a rank only those 

On the verge of retirement could
hope to achieve.
It's the level of Tamer that's
basically a living legend.
But, well, in saying that,
it certainly suits you♪
translation:
Oh my, you made it so far...

To become a Legend Tamer...
I've never seen one before.
I thought it was a rank only those 

On the verge of retirement could
hope to achieve.
It's the level of Tamer that's
basically a living legend.
But, well, in saying that,
it certainly suits you♪

original:
You want my advice?
I...If you don't, you'll regret it!
I heard you can find Azulongmon's
Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Baby 
stage Digimon to find it though...
How was that?! Useful, huh?!
translation:
You want my advice?
I...If you don't, you'll regret it!
I heard you can find Azulongmon's
Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Baby 
stage Digimon to find it though...
How was that?! Useful, huh?!

original:
How's the diet going?
Don't overwork yourself!
translation:
How's the diet going?
Don't overwork yourself!

original:
You're amazing, ^P!
Please be my Tamer!
translation:
You're amazing, ^P!
Please be my Tamer!

original:
An ally of justice!
That's me!
I visited the DigiBase...
In order to protect the peace!
What's that?!
Peace is already here?!
Damn it!
I was too late!
translation:
An ally of justice!
That's me!
I visited the DigiBase...
In order to protect the peace!
What's that?!
Peace is already here?!
Damn it!
I was too late!

original:
From now on, I'll protect this place
in order to keep the peace!
translation:
From now on, I'll protect this place
in order to keep the peace!

original:
^P, thanks for everything,
here's some info in exchange...
I heard you can find Zhuqiaomon's
Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Mega
stage Digimon to find it though...
translation:
^P, thanks for everything,
here's some info in exchange...
I heard you can find Zhuqiaomon's
Plate on an expedition...!
You'll need a level 70 Mega
stage Digimon to find it though...

original:
Hey, ^P, hear this!
I've finally left!
I've graduated from your teaching,
thank you for everything!
translation:
Hey, ^P, hear this!
I've finally left!
I've graduated from your teaching,
thank you for everything!

original:
I got a reply to my letter!
I need to write a reply right away!
translation:
I got a reply to my letter!
I need to write a reply right away!

original:
I've discovered a way to cultivate
the aptitude of gold!
Your qualities will shine with
a brilliant golden glow!
Allow me to continue polishing your
golden qualities!
translation:
I've discovered a way to cultivate
the aptitude of gold!
Your qualities will shine with
a brilliant golden glow!
Allow me to continue polishing your
golden qualities!

original:
I know! If you want to gather 
together all the Golden Digimon,
Then head over to Class Desert!
They'll be waiting for you!
translation:
I know! If you want to gather 
together all the Golden Digimon,
Then head over to Class Desert!
They'll be waiting for you!

original:
So you really did defeat the
Selectors all on your own.
In that case, comparing you to the
Tamers of the Union...
Doesn't that mean you're the
superior one...?
That's incredible, but... What does
that say about the Union...?
translation:
So you really did defeat the
Selectors all on your own.
In that case, comparing you to the
Tamers of the Union...
Doesn't that mean you're the
superior one...?
That's incredible, but... What does
that say about the Union...?

original:
A Legend Tamer, huh?

I guess taking into account 
everything you've done so far,
Reaching such a level was an
obvious outcome.
Congratulations, ^P.
translation:
A Legend Tamer, huh?

I guess taking into account 
everything you've done so far,
Reaching such a level was an
obvious outcome.
Congratulations, ^P.

original:
So it's true that you defeated
the Selectors...
You're just full of surprises,
aren't you...
Then that means the rumor calling
you our savior...
That was legit, it wasn't a joke
like I had thought!
translation:
So it's true that you defeated
the Selectors...
You're just full of surprises,
aren't you...
Then that means the rumor calling
you our savior...
That was legit, it wasn't a joke
like I had thought!

original:
Hey there, savior.
.........
No matter how much I say it, 
it still feels odd to say...
I bet its weird for you to hear it,
too, huh??
translation:
Hey there, savior.
.........
No matter how much I say it, 
it still feels odd to say...
I bet its weird for you to hear it,
too, huh??

original:
Ah, you're a Legend Tamer.
I see, that's wonderful.
I'm not surprised by anything I
hear about you, anymore.
But that's probably the fault of
those who tell me about you.
Rather than 'savior', I'd prefer
to call you a Legend.
translation:
Ah, you're a Legend Tamer.
I see, that's wonderful.
I'm not surprised by anything I
hear about you, anymore.
But that's probably the fault of
those who tell me about you.
Rather than 'savior', I'd prefer
to call you a Legend.

original:
What's with you? 
I heard, you know...
That you defeated the Selectors,
and saved the world all by yourself.
What kind of sick joke is this...

...What? You couldn't have done it
all alone...?
Then who...
The Bandits?!
translation:
What's with you? 
I heard, you know...
That you defeated the Selectors,
and saved the world all by yourself.
What kind of sick joke is this...

...What? You couldn't have done it
all alone...?
Then who...
The Bandits?!

original:
The Bandits were just the 
Selectors' lap dogs, weren't they?
They saved you, and helped you
defeat the Selectors, you say...?
What kind of weird joke is that...
translation:
The Bandits were just the 
Selectors' lap dogs, weren't they?
They saved you, and helped you
defeat the Selectors, you say...?
What kind of weird joke is that...

original:
You're a Legend Tamer, I see.
I can't even bring myself to laugh.
I barely understand the concept
of a Platinum Tamer,
I've never even heard of such a
legendary Tamer!
translation:
You're a Legend Tamer, I see.
I can't even bring myself to laugh.
I barely understand the concept
of a Platinum Tamer,
I've never even heard of such a
legendary Tamer!

original:
So you beat the Selectors and 
saved the world...?
Ah yes, I see, I see. Very good.
You're amazing. Really.
You really don't need to go around
bragging about it.
translation:
So you beat the Selectors and 
saved the world...?
Ah yes, I see, I see. Very good.
You're amazing. Really.
You really don't need to go around
bragging about it.

original:
Where did you get such powerful
motivation?
Even just entering the Colossem is
nothing but a dream for me.
translation:
Where did you get such powerful
motivation?
Even just entering the Colossem is
nothing but a dream for me.

original:
Guh...! Legend Tamer?
...Hmph, guess it was natural.
Going from a savior to a legend,
What's next for you?
A King? Or possibly...
A demon lord...?
translation:
Guh...! Legend Tamer?
...Hmph, guess it was natural.
Going from a savior to a legend,
What's next for you?
A King? Or possibly...
A demon lord...?

original:
Oh, the Platinum Tamer is here!
What did you do this time?
...You beat the Selectors?!
Really?!
You really cannot help doing so 
many things...
translation:
Oh, the Platinum Tamer is here!
What did you do this time?
...You beat the Selectors?!
Really?!
You really cannot help doing so 
many things...

original:
Whenever you show up
you startle me!
This is bad for my heart! 
So please, slow down?
translation:
Whenever you show up
you startle me!
This is bad for my heart! 
So please, slow down?

original:
So you're a Legend Tamer now...
Isn't that the end, then?
There's no more ranks or activities
for you to do, right?
All that's really left would be
something world-destroying...
.........
.........
I'm just gonna tell you this,
but you should quit before that...
Since once you decide to do 
something, you'll never quit!
translation:
So you're a Legend Tamer now...
Isn't that the end, then?
There's no more ranks or activities
for you to do, right?
All that's really left would be
something world-destroying...
.........
.........
I'm just gonna tell you this,
but you should quit before that...
Since once you decide to do 
something, you'll never quit!

original:
So you're the savior of the
Digital World...
You utterly wiped the floor with
those Selectors.
And to do it all by yourself, 
at that...
Have you always been like that?
That level of strength is weird!
translation:
So you're the savior of the
Digital World...
You utterly wiped the floor with
those Selectors.
And to do it all by yourself, 
at that...
Have you always been like that?
That level of strength is weird!

original:
What will you do, now?
There's no one left to fight...
The Legend Tamer battle over at
the Colosseum...?
That legendary Tamer rank?!
You can become a living legend?!
It was such an obscure legend
though!
translation:
What will you do, now?
There's no one left to fight...
The Legend Tamer battle over at
the Colosseum...?
That legendary Tamer rank?!
You can become a living legend?!
It was such an obscure legend
though!

original:
...Legend Tamer, huh?
Yeah... of course.
I knew it from the start,
that you'd leave your mark.
Whether it be through a legacy,
or through a legend...
Congratulations, ^P.
Your reputation will last forever.
translation:
...Legend Tamer, huh?
Yeah... of course.
I knew it from the start,
that you'd leave your mark.
Whether it be through a legacy,
or through a legend...
Congratulations, ^P.
Your reputation will last forever.

original:
You decided to show your face,
huh, you pathetic 'savior'!
Hey, come on now! 
Whats with that glum look!?
Be happy for once!
You defeated the Selectors!
translation:
You decided to show your face,
huh, you pathetic 'savior'!
Hey, come on now! 
Whats with that glum look!?
Be happy for once!
You defeated the Selectors!

original:
It's okay to raise your head high
and be proud once in a while, okay?
You're just too perfect,
so keep that advice in mind.
...If there's any issue,
it's that you're too perfect...
In other words...
How do I put this...
Since you never fail, hearing your
stories is kinda boring, you get me?
translation:
It's okay to raise your head high
and be proud once in a while, okay?
You're just too perfect,
so keep that advice in mind.
...If there's any issue,
it's that you're too perfect...
In other words...
How do I put this...
Since you never fail, hearing your
stories is kinda boring, you get me?

original:
This time it's Legend Rank...?
You've gotta be kidding me...
Why is it only you who has such
crazy level strength?
...Because you're a legend?
I think you've got it backwards...
translation:
This time it's Legend Rank...?
You've gotta be kidding me...
Why is it only you who has such
crazy level strength?
...Because you're a legend?
I think you've got it backwards...

original:
Such a tiny Tamer managed to
beat the Selectors...??
So you're the savior of the
Digital World...
No matter how hard I look, you're
still just a pipsqueak to me...
translation:
Such a tiny Tamer managed to
beat the Selectors...??
So you're the savior of the
Digital World...
No matter how hard I look, you're
still just a pipsqueak to me...

original:
So you're our savior, huh...
I can't even comprehend it...
"What part are you confused 
about" you ask...
Even if I ask questions,
I doubt it'll help...
translation:
So you're our savior, huh...
I can't even comprehend it...
"What part are you confused 
about" you ask...
Even if I ask questions,
I doubt it'll help...

original:
Oh, ^P,
You've become a Legend Tamer?
Congratulations.
You've reached the final rank.
There's no rank past Legend...

And for the most part, there's no
one else to fight, is there...?
translation:
Oh, ^P,
You've become a Legend Tamer?
Congratulations.
You've reached the final rank.
There's no rank past Legend...

And for the most part, there's no
one else to fight, is there...?

original:
So you've become the savior.
Has anything changed since then?
Too many people are praising you?
...The heck is that?
That's certainly not a complaint I
hear often...
translation:
So you've become the savior.
Has anything changed since then?
Too many people are praising you?
...The heck is that?
That's certainly not a complaint I
hear often...

original:
Isn't being called 'savior' all the
time kinda troublesome?
I mean, first of all, how do you
even react to that?
translation:
Isn't being called 'savior' all the
time kinda troublesome?
I mean, first of all, how do you
even react to that?

original:
So you've become a Legend Rank.
Has anything changed since then?
...I see, things have changed,
huh, ^P?
For a Digimon, change just means
you're living and thriving.
That's why I'm glad you've
changed.
translation:
So you've become a Legend Rank.
Has anything changed since then?
...I see, things have changed,
huh, ^P?
For a Digimon, change just means
you're living and thriving.
That's why I'm glad you've
changed.

original:
I knew you could do it.

You came here in order to save
the Digital World, after all.
You're our savior and our
guardian angel...
...Hm? That's supposed to be my
duty...?
translation:
I knew you could do it.

You came here in order to save
the Digital World, after all.
You're our savior and our
guardian angel...
...Hm? That's supposed to be my
duty...?

original:
So I heard you were aiming to 
become a Legend Tamer...
Since it's you, I know you can
do it!
I'm sure everyone else thinks the 
same! You're already a legend!
translation:
So I heard you were aiming to 
become a Legend Tamer...
Since it's you, I know you can
do it!
I'm sure everyone else thinks the 
same! You're already a legend!

original:
I knew you'd become a Legend
Tamer.
...It really suits you a lot more
than I expected.
Setting aside your strength, you're
just too young, serious, and kind.
translation:
I knew you'd become a Legend
Tamer.
...It really suits you a lot more
than I expected.
Setting aside your strength, you're
just too young, serious, and kind.

original:
Hey, ^P
I heard this rumor...
They say you're the savior that
protected the Digital World?
What's with that expression?
So is it true? Or was it a lie??
translation:
Hey, ^P
I heard this rumor...
They say you're the savior that
protected the Digital World?
What's with that expression?
So is it true? Or was it a lie??

original:
Heeeh... So it's true you defeated
the Selectors' boss...
Isn't that incredible♪
You really are the savior...
...What? You fought together with
the Bandits...?
Urmmm... considering their image,
that sounds pretty weird...
translation:
Heeeh... So it's true you defeated
the Selectors' boss...
Isn't that incredible♪
You really are the savior...
...What? You fought together with
the Bandits...?
Urmmm... considering their image,
that sounds pretty weird...

original:
Legend Tamer... You mean you're 
a legendary Tamer...?
I see... Is that the number one
Tamer rank...?
I don't really get it but...
That's great! Congratulations!
translation:
Legend Tamer... You mean you're 
a legendary Tamer...?
I see... Is that the number one
Tamer rank...?
I don't really get it but...
That's great! Congratulations!

original:
So not only are you a Platinum
Tamer and World Champion...
But I heard you surpassed that
and became something bigger.
What was it called again...
Local... God?
No? Then... some sort of new
Selector...?
...No? What was it... hmmm...
translation:
So not only are you a Platinum
Tamer and World Champion...
But I heard you surpassed that
and became something bigger.
What was it called again...
Local... God?
No? Then... some sort of new
Selector...?
...No? What was it... hmmm...

original:
You defeated the Selectors and
saved the Digital World...
And so you're a savior?
Ah, I see now...
So it's kind of like being a 
part-time god, right?
translation:
You defeated the Selectors and
saved the Digital World...
And so you're a savior?
Ah, I see now...
So it's kind of like being a 
part-time god, right?

original:
Legend Tamer...?
The legendary tamer rank, huh...
Aren't you becoming more
and more like some sort of god...?
translation:
Legend Tamer...?
The legendary tamer rank, huh...
Aren't you becoming more
and more like some sort of god...?

original:
You beat the Selectors?
Congratulations...
Hm? My reaction was pathetic?
Well, it's nothing to do with me.
The Selectors never came to this
town full of good-for-nothings.
Felt like the match was over before
I even reached the bleachers.
translation:
You beat the Selectors?
Congratulations...
Hm? My reaction was pathetic?
Well, it's nothing to do with me.
The Selectors never came to this
town full of good-for-nothings.
Felt like the match was over before
I even reached the bleachers.

original:
What are we supposed to do
now...?
translation:
What are we supposed to do
now...?

original:
I see... you're a Legend Tamer,
as in the legendary rank, huh?
Meanwhile, as for me...
.........
I've given up here, and decided to
return to the Real World!
My true place just doesn't seem
to be here!
...But then again, it doesn't seem
to be in the Real World, either...
translation:
I see... you're a Legend Tamer,
as in the legendary rank, huh?
Meanwhile, as for me...
.........
I've given up here, and decided to
return to the Real World!
My true place just doesn't seem
to be here!
...But then again, it doesn't seem
to be in the Real World, either...

original:
On top of making it back safely,
you defeated the Selectors alone?!
And you rescued everyone, too??
Really, ^P.
You're so perfect, isn't it boring?
Let me get your heart racing again!
.........Uhyohyohyo...♪
translation:
On top of making it back safely,
you defeated the Selectors alone?!
And you rescued everyone, too??
Really, ^P.
You're so perfect, isn't it boring?
Let me get your heart racing again!
.........Uhyohyohyo...♪

original:
The fact that I simply cannot allow
myself to laze around here anymore...
It's all your fault! And your fault!
And your fault!
I'm thankful, you know?
Very quietly in my heart.
translation:
The fact that I simply cannot allow
myself to laze around here anymore...
It's all your fault! And your fault!
And your fault!
I'm thankful, you know?
Very quietly in my heart.

original:
Legend rank? What's that?
A legendary Tamer?
It sounds kinda cool, but I don't
really get it.
But weren't you a legend from the
very beginning...?
Or is the one who decides whether
you're a legend or not...
The Union?
...Uhyohyohyo...♪
translation:
Legend rank? What's that?
A legendary Tamer?
It sounds kinda cool, but I don't
really get it.
But weren't you a legend from the
very beginning...?
Or is the one who decides whether
you're a legend or not...
The Union?
...Uhyohyohyo...♪

original:
Looks like you've splendidly tackled
everything that's come your way!
Jeez... the nerve you have 
becoming such a great Tamer...
Everyone around here are calling you
their savior.
translation:
Looks like you've splendidly tackled
everything that's come your way!
Jeez... the nerve you have 
becoming such a great Tamer...
Everyone around here are calling you
their savior.

original:
Hey, I heard you're perfectly fine
being referred to as the savior,
But aren't you doing all this work
for essentially nothing?
Is all that effort really worth 
mere praise?
...Though I guess referring to you
like that suits you perfectly.
translation:
Hey, I heard you're perfectly fine
being referred to as the savior,
But aren't you doing all this work
for essentially nothing?
Is all that effort really worth 
mere praise?
...Though I guess referring to you
like that suits you perfectly.

original:
...Legend Tamer?
Congrats...
...What's that mean, anyway?

Don't get me wrong, I understand
you've been working hard,
But doesn't that mean you're now
legendary?
Can such young blood really 
handle such a title?
It's usually something to look back
on at the moment of death.
translation:
...Legend Tamer?
Congrats...
...What's that mean, anyway?

Don't get me wrong, I understand
you've been working hard,
But doesn't that mean you're now
legendary?
Can such young blood really 
handle such a title?
It's usually something to look back
on at the moment of death.

original:
Thank you, ^P

What for...? 
For just about everything, silly!
For saving my precious friends and
my home.
I thought I should thank you 
properly for everything you've done
translation:
Thank you, ^P

What for...? 
For just about everything, silly!
For saving my precious friends and
my home.
I thought I should thank you 
properly for everything you've done

original:
Seems you've become a
Legend Tamer.
There's been quite a few Tamers
that have become legends.
But it's certainly not something any
regular Tamer can hope to achieve.
But when it comes to the things 
you've managed to do...
I think you're more than suited
to that title, ^P.
translation:
Seems you've become a
Legend Tamer.
There's been quite a few Tamers
that have become legends.
But it's certainly not something any
regular Tamer can hope to achieve.
But when it comes to the things 
you've managed to do...
I think you're more than suited
to that title, ^P.

original:
I still refuse to accept that you
saved our world, nume!
I mean, why haven't the Bandits
returned yet, huh?!
When they return, then I'll finally
accept it, nume.
translation:
I still refuse to accept that you
saved our world, nume!
I mean, why haven't the Bandits
returned yet, huh?!
When they return, then I'll finally
accept it, nume.

original:
To be honest, it doesn't matter to
me if the Bandits don't come back.
So long as they're safe, that's all
that matters to me, nume.
Thank you for saving us, and
our world, nume.
You're the 4th best Tamer in the
world, nume.
translation:
To be honest, it doesn't matter to
me if the Bandits don't come back.
So long as they're safe, that's all
that matters to me, nume.
Thank you for saving us, and
our world, nume.
You're the 4th best Tamer in the
world, nume.

original:
.........
Legend Tamer?
What's that?
Is it edible?
translation:
.........
Legend Tamer?
What's that?
Is it edible?

original:
Everyone's been coming back since
you defeated the Selectors!♪
I'm sure the Bandits will also
return someday, nume...♪
I want to see them really bad, but
at the same time, I don't, nume♪
I don't want that shock of seeing
how strong they've become.♪
translation:
Everyone's been coming back since
you defeated the Selectors!♪
I'm sure the Bandits will also
return someday, nume...♪
I want to see them really bad, but
at the same time, I don't, nume♪
I don't want that shock of seeing
how strong they've become.♪

original:
We're just doing as Tres told
us, nume.
To protect ourselves, our friends,
and our home, nume.
translation:
We're just doing as Tres told
us, nume.
To protect ourselves, our friends,
and our home, nume.

original:
Legend Tamer...?
So you've become legendary...
Congratulations on that!
You're really something, nume♪
translation:
Legend Tamer...?
So you've become legendary...
Congratulations on that!
You're really something, nume♪

original:
You defeated the Selectors, nume!

And you rescued everyone who'd 
been kidnapped, nume!
In that case, all the Tamers,
all the Digimon, and the Bandits too,
They'll be returning soon, nume!

.........
But I wonder if they will...?
translation:
You defeated the Selectors, nume!

And you rescued everyone who'd 
been kidnapped, nume!
In that case, all the Tamers,
all the Digimon, and the Bandits too,
They'll be returning soon, nume!

.........
But I wonder if they will...?

original:
If I just keep waiting here, the
Bandits will return eventually♪
Nume nume nume... nume...♪
translation:
If I just keep waiting here, the
Bandits will return eventually♪
Nume nume nume... nume...♪

original:
Legend Tamer?
What's that? Legendary?
Well, that doesn't really matter to
the Numemon here, nume.
But congratulations, nonetheless.

It's a rank worthy of someone like
you, nume♪
translation:
Legend Tamer?
What's that? Legendary?
Well, that doesn't really matter to
the Numemon here, nume.
But congratulations, nonetheless.

It's a rank worthy of someone like
you, nume♪

original:
Oh my! You defeated them?
The Selectors??
Oh my my my! No way, darling!
Aren't you just something!
I can't believe it, my dear!
What an achievement, huh?!
translation:
Oh my! You defeated them?
The Selectors??
Oh my my my! No way, darling!
Aren't you just something!
I can't believe it, my dear!
What an achievement, huh?!

original:
You did so well, my dear!

You worked so hard, I'm sure,
darling!
translation:
You did so well, my dear!

You worked so hard, I'm sure,
darling!

original:
What's this? Legend Tamer??
Oh my my my! No way, darling!
You're a legend now?!
Really truly?! My my my!
You're such the little achiever,
my dear, aren't you?!
translation:
What's this? Legend Tamer??
Oh my my my! No way, darling!
You're a legend now?!
Really truly?! My my my!
You're such the little achiever,
my dear, aren't you?!

original:
So it was you who saved the
Digital World after all, huh?
There's no doubt that what you
did was a good thing, nume.
No offence, but the fact it was you
who did it is kinda boring...
I was hoping the Bandits would be 
the ones to save the world, nume.
translation:
So it was you who saved the
Digital World after all, huh?
There's no doubt that what you
did was a good thing, nume.
No offence, but the fact it was you
who did it is kinda boring...
I was hoping the Bandits would be 
the ones to save the world, nume.

original:
You did well, nume.
You really worked hard, nume.
Thank you for that, nume.
translation:
You did well, nume.
You really worked hard, nume.
Thank you for that, nume.

original:
You became a Legend Tamer,
nume?
That's no easy feat huh?
Well done, nume.
translation:
You became a Legend Tamer,
nume?
That's no easy feat huh?
Well done, nume.

original:
Don't get carried away now, what
with everyone praising you, nume!
It's still way too early for you to
be making such a smug face!
250 million years too early, nume!

You should start all over, beginning
at the planktonic stage, nume.
translation:
Don't get carried away now, what
with everyone praising you, nume!
It's still way too early for you to
be making such a smug face!
250 million years too early, nume!

You should start all over, beginning
at the planktonic stage, nume.

original:
.........
I understand now, nume.
No matter what people say,
no matter what people think,
You really are our savior, nume.
translation:
.........
I understand now, nume.
No matter what people say,
no matter what people think,
You really are our savior, nume.

original:
Legend Tamer?
Who cares about that, nume.
Who you are, where you came from,
none of that matters to us, nume.
To us Numemon you're simply
a Tamer.
But...
.........
We're thankful that you saved us,
and the Bandits, nume.
translation:
Legend Tamer?
Who cares about that, nume.
Who you are, where you came from,
none of that matters to us, nume.
To us Numemon you're simply
a Tamer.
But...
.........
We're thankful that you saved us,
and the Bandits, nume.

original:
Hey there, nume!
You did great out there, nume!
Defeating the Selectors,
saving our comrades, nume!
There couldn't have been a better
outcome, nume!
Alright! Yeah!
Great job!
translation:
Hey there, nume!
You did great out there, nume!
Defeating the Selectors,
saving our comrades, nume!
There couldn't have been a better
outcome, nume!
Alright! Yeah!
Great job!

original:
I know we Numemon have said
a lot of harsh things, but...
Deep down, we always knew you
could do it♪
translation:
I know we Numemon have said
a lot of harsh things, but...
Deep down, we always knew you
could do it♪

original:
Legend Tamer?
Congratulations on that, nume...
But are you still out here looking
for a fight...?
There's no one else who can hope
to stand up to you, nume.
translation:
Legend Tamer?
Congratulations on that, nume...
But are you still out here looking
for a fight...?
There's no one else who can hope
to stand up to you, nume.

original:
Oh! If it isn't the brand new savior
of the Digital World, nume!
Despite that title, I'm still going to
call you brother!
I knew you'd go and defeat the
Selectors with ease, nume!
Ain't that cool!
Super cool!
Heh, my excitement level has
doubled, nume!
translation:
Oh! If it isn't the brand new savior
of the Digital World, nume!
Despite that title, I'm still going to
call you brother!
I knew you'd go and defeat the
Selectors with ease, nume!
Ain't that cool!
Super cool!
Heh, my excitement level has
doubled, nume!

original:
Rumor has it you're aiming to 
become a Legend Tamer, nume.
Is that true?
...It is, nume?!
In that case, is it also true,

That a Legend Tamer needs a 
statue erected at the library?
translation:
Rumor has it you're aiming to 
become a Legend Tamer, nume.
Is that true?
...It is, nume?!
In that case, is it also true,

That a Legend Tamer needs a 
statue erected at the library?

original:
Whoa... you became a Legend
Tamer, nume?!
You do suddenly give off the feeling
of being a well travelled individual!
What do you say I get to erecting
that statue at the library, nume?
translation:
Whoa... you became a Legend
Tamer, nume?!
You do suddenly give off the feeling
of being a well travelled individual!
What do you say I get to erecting
that statue at the library, nume?

original:
This is just between us, but...
That 'big sister' Numemon...
She's no 'big sister', but instead
just a plain old 'mother', yeah...?
I get it, but there's no need to go
telling everyone about it, nume.
If she wants to be called 'big 
sister', then let her be.
That's the unspoken rule here
in Numemon City, nume...
That's just how it is...
translation:
This is just between us, but...
That 'big sister' Numemon...
She's no 'big sister', but instead
just a plain old 'mother', yeah...?
I get it, but there's no need to go
telling everyone about it, nume.
If she wants to be called 'big 
sister', then let her be.
That's the unspoken rule here
in Numemon City, nume...
That's just how it is...

original:
From now on, instead of calling me
'Number 1'...
I'd like you to refer to me as
'Revolution'!
...What, you're saying it doesn't
sound right, nume?!
translation:
From now on, instead of calling me
'Number 1'...
I'd like you to refer to me as
'Revolution'!
...What, you're saying it doesn't
sound right, nume?!

original:
What's with all this talk about
becoming a Legend, nume?
When I think of an incredible and
unique legend...
I certainly don't think of a squishy
pipsqueak like you, nume!
translation:
What's with all this talk about
becoming a Legend, nume?
When I think of an incredible and
unique legend...
I certainly don't think of a squishy
pipsqueak like you, nume!

original:
Just between you and me...

Numemon Number 1 has gone a
bit strange, nume...
I'm hoping it wasn't some side
effect from the doping earlier, but
I'm worried it might be, and that'd
be all our fault, nume...
translation:
Just between you and me...

Numemon Number 1 has gone a
bit strange, nume...
I'm hoping it wasn't some side
effect from the doping earlier, but
I'm worried it might be, and that'd
be all our fault, nume...

original:
I heard big sis Numemon and
Number 1 got into a fight, nume...
Just a little longer and it would
have becoming quite the scene...
Their voices were raised, and they
were going at it like crazy!
I have no clue why, nume!
translation:
I heard big sis Numemon and
Number 1 got into a fight, nume...
Just a little longer and it would
have becoming quite the scene...
Their voices were raised, and they
were going at it like crazy!
I have no clue why, nume!

original:
So you became a Legend Tamer?
Like that matters to me, nume...
Though I can't help but be jelaous
of everyone fawning over you...
translation:
So you became a Legend Tamer?
Like that matters to me, nume...
Though I can't help but be jelaous
of everyone fawning over you...

original:
It's a little weird to refer to 
Numemon as 'Number 1'♪
Same for 'Number 2', I can't
help but be bothered by it♪
translation:
It's a little weird to refer to 
Numemon as 'Number 1'♪
Same for 'Number 2', I can't
help but be bothered by it♪

original: I'm sick of using those names♪
translation: I'm sick of using those names♪

original:
You certainly don't look like you've
achieved Legend Tamer rank, nume.
But I'll congratulate you, since 
everyone's so proud of you♪
translation:
You certainly don't look like you've
achieved Legend Tamer rank, nume.
But I'll congratulate you, since 
everyone's so proud of you♪

original:
I've heard all sorts of rumors
about you, ^P.
That you stopped the Digital World
from becoming one, nume.
Though whether that's a good
thing or not...
I have no idea, nume.
translation:
I've heard all sorts of rumors
about you, ^P.
That you stopped the Digital World
from becoming one, nume.
Though whether that's a good
thing or not...
I have no idea, nume.

original:
To bring the world together as one,

The Selectors made use of strong
Digimon,
As well as turning Tamers into
Erasers, nume...
It's just horrible...

It'd be all over if they erased us
weak Numemon, nume...
translation:
To bring the world together as one,

The Selectors made use of strong
Digimon,
As well as turning Tamers into
Erasers, nume...
It's just horrible...

It'd be all over if they erased us
weak Numemon, nume...

original:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer.
So you've finally become legendary,
nume.
Though you're quite young for
a legend.
translation:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer.
So you've finally become legendary,
nume.
Though you're quite young for
a legend.

original:
I always wished someone would
take down the Selectors,
But I never thought someone would
actually do it, nume!
translation:
I always wished someone would
take down the Selectors,
But I never thought someone would
actually do it, nume!

original:
You've become quite the incredible
Tamer, haven't you, nume?
You've certainly overtaken all
expectations the Numemon had.
translation:
You've become quite the incredible
Tamer, haven't you, nume?
You've certainly overtaken all
expectations the Numemon had.

original:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer♪
Celebrating this is the very least
I can do, nume!
After all, you saved all those who
had been kidnapped!
And you didn't even break a sweat!
translation:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer♪
Celebrating this is the very least
I can do, nume!
After all, you saved all those who
had been kidnapped!
And you didn't even break a sweat!

original:
You're the first person to ever
defeat a Selector, nume.
I've never seen anyone as
strong as you,
Nor as hardworking or as
kind as you, nume!
The only ones who could possibly
outdo you...
Would be the Bandits, nume!
translation:
You're the first person to ever
defeat a Selector, nume.
I've never seen anyone as
strong as you,
Nor as hardworking or as
kind as you, nume!
The only ones who could possibly
outdo you...
Would be the Bandits, nume!

original:
You're incredible, you know that?

I've never heard of anyone like you,
nume.
My heart always races whenever I
hear about your efforts.
Since I've secretly respected you,
nume.
translation:
You're incredible, you know that?

I've never heard of anyone like you,
nume.
My heart always races whenever I
hear about your efforts.
Since I've secretly respected you,
nume.

original:
Aside from you, I've never heard of
anyone else getting Legend Rank.
I'd never even heard of it until
I heard about you, nume.
translation:
Aside from you, I've never heard of
anyone else getting Legend Rank.
I'd never even heard of it until
I heard about you, nume.

original:
You really did save the Digital 
World, nume...
Thank you so much!
I'm glad I chose to believe in you!
You're the best Tamer in the
entire world, nume♪
........

Well, aside from the Bandits,
of course!
translation:
You really did save the Digital 
World, nume...
Thank you so much!
I'm glad I chose to believe in you!
You're the best Tamer in the
entire world, nume♪
........

Well, aside from the Bandits,
of course!

original:
You did a great job out there, but
I can't help but ask...
What are you doing wandering 
about around here, nume?
Do you have too much free time?
translation:
You did a great job out there, but
I can't help but ask...
What are you doing wandering 
about around here, nume?
Do you have too much free time?

original:
Legend Tamer...?
I've heard of it, but...
Is it some legendary rank or
something like that, nume?
And here I thought you'd retired
from being a Tamer, nume.
translation:
Legend Tamer...?
I've heard of it, but...
Is it some legendary rank or
something like that, nume?
And here I thought you'd retired
from being a Tamer, nume.

original:
Yo, ^P!
Or should I call you 'savior'?
Defeating the Selectors, saving
the Digital World.
You've done some incredible things!

Will I, too, finally be released from 
this desolate prison...?
translation:
Yo, ^P!
Or should I call you 'savior'?
Defeating the Selectors, saving
the Digital World.
You've done some incredible things!

Will I, too, finally be released from 
this desolate prison...?

original:
Legend Tamer?
Congrats, ^P.
.........
.........
I received a message from the
Union earlier...
People are starting to return, so
I need to remain here for now.
.........
.........
translation:
Legend Tamer?
Congrats, ^P.
.........
.........
I received a message from the
Union earlier...
People are starting to return, so
I need to remain here for now.
.........
.........

original:
What...?! You finally defeated
the Selectors?!
Even for a Platinum Tamer,
it's quite the feat!
translation:
What...?! You finally defeated
the Selectors?!
Even for a Platinum Tamer,
it's quite the feat!

original:
But in the end... everything 
happened because of you...
Awakened that shut-away,
sent away the evil,
Saved all our comrades,
and took back our world.
...Everything was your doing.
translation:
But in the end... everything 
happened because of you...
Awakened that shut-away,
sent away the evil,
Saved all our comrades,
and took back our world.
...Everything was your doing.

original:
You're a Legend Tamer?
Great job.
Such a rank suits you just perfectly.
translation:
You're a Legend Tamer?
Great job.
Such a rank suits you just perfectly.

original:
I heard a terrible rumor from those
who saw you beat the Selectors.
That all the people and Digimon
who were erased by the Erasers,
They were all mixed together and
turned into new Erasers...
Whether thats true or not...
I don't want to know...
translation:
I heard a terrible rumor from those
who saw you beat the Selectors.
That all the people and Digimon
who were erased by the Erasers,
They were all mixed together and
turned into new Erasers...
Whether thats true or not...
I don't want to know...

original:
There's something I thought was
kind of stranger.
Those who left the town without
fighting the Local Champion...
Just where on earth did those
Tamers go...?
It seems they didn't return to
Motherboard Continent...
Were they kidnapped by the
Selectors...?
translation:
There's something I thought was
kind of stranger.
Those who left the town without
fighting the Local Champion...
Just where on earth did those
Tamers go...?
It seems they didn't return to
Motherboard Continent...
Were they kidnapped by the
Selectors...?

original:
Legend Tamer rank huh...
A Tamer of legend...
Congratulations.
Though it feels a little bittersweet.
It seems you've reached the end
of your journey.
translation:
Legend Tamer rank huh...
A Tamer of legend...
Congratulations.
Though it feels a little bittersweet.
It seems you've reached the end
of your journey.

original:
Ah, young Tamer. Or should I say
strongest Tamer in the world?
You're our savior, there's no
doubt about that.
translation:
Ah, young Tamer. Or should I say
strongest Tamer in the world?
You're our savior, there's no
doubt about that.

original:
I'm incredibly indebted to you and
all, but...
The problem is that no one stood
up to help you out.
They just pushed everything onto
you without making an effort.
They're the worst...
Of course, that includes myself.
translation:
I'm incredibly indebted to you and
all, but...
The problem is that no one stood
up to help you out.
They just pushed everything onto
you without making an effort.
They're the worst...
Of course, that includes myself.

original:
It was totally obvious you'd 
become a Legend Tamer.
A clear outcome in the end.
Anyway...
Congrats, ^P!
translation:
It was totally obvious you'd 
become a Legend Tamer.
A clear outcome in the end.
Anyway...
Congrats, ^P!

original:
You defeated the Selectors who
attacked the Colosseum?
I see... and you also saved all those
who'd been kidnapped...
translation:
You defeated the Selectors who
attacked the Colosseum?
I see... and you also saved all those
who'd been kidnapped...

original: You truly are something♪
translation: You truly are something♪

original:
You've become a Legend Tamer...?

You truly are an incredible
Tamer♪
translation:
You've become a Legend Tamer...?

You truly are an incredible
Tamer♪

original:
You defeated the Selectors?!
All by yourself?!
...Wait... WHAT?!
The Bandits helped you?!
Hrmmm... I find that seriously
difficult to believe...
Anyway, you really did an
incredible thing.
translation:
You defeated the Selectors?!
All by yourself?!
...Wait... WHAT?!
The Bandits helped you?!
Hrmmm... I find that seriously
difficult to believe...
Anyway, you really did an
incredible thing.

original:
I'm at a loss for words. All I can
say is well done.
You truly are...

The number one Tamer of the
Digital World♪
translation:
I'm at a loss for words. All I can
say is well done.
You truly are...

The number one Tamer of the
Digital World♪

original:
I already heard you've become
a Legend Tamer♪
It was only a matter of time before
you'd attain that rank though.
Congratulations, ^P!
You'll go down in history!
translation:
I already heard you've become
a Legend Tamer♪
It was only a matter of time before
you'd attain that rank though.
Congratulations, ^P!
You'll go down in history!

original:
It seems hearing that you defeated
the Selectors...
My Tamer seems to have changed.

...In a bad way...
translation:
It seems hearing that you defeated
the Selectors...
My Tamer seems to have changed.

...In a bad way...

original:
My 37 year old Tamer in the 
shorts...
They went off somewhere and
never came back...
...It doesn't matter anymore.
translation:
My 37 year old Tamer in the 
shorts...
They went off somewhere and
never came back...
...It doesn't matter anymore.

original:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer.
My own Tamer wants to 
congratulate you, too.
But they returned to the Real World
in search of a job...
.........

A-anyway, let's move on from that
topic...
translation:
Congratulations on becoming a
Legend Tamer.
My own Tamer wants to 
congratulate you, too.
But they returned to the Real World
in search of a job...
.........

A-anyway, let's move on from that
topic...

original:
I heard you defeated the Selectors
all on your own, ^P.
I think since then, the Tamers here
have rethought their purpose in life.
Many of them have decided to go
back to training again.
...Hm? What about the other
half...?
I dunno, maybe they decided to
retire from being Tamers?
translation:
I heard you defeated the Selectors
all on your own, ^P.
I think since then, the Tamers here
have rethought their purpose in life.
Many of them have decided to go
back to training again.
...Hm? What about the other
half...?
I dunno, maybe they decided to
retire from being Tamers?

original:
I'm also going to return to the
Real World for a bit.
But I plan to return to the Digital
World, of course.
Ummm... I'm not really sure what
I should say but...
Thank you, ^P,
for opening my eyes.
translation:
I'm also going to return to the
Real World for a bit.
But I plan to return to the Digital
World, of course.
Ummm... I'm not really sure what
I should say but...
Thank you, ^P,
for opening my eyes.

original:
Legend Tamer huh?
You truly are amazing!
I wonder if the Tamers here could
achieve such a feat if they tried?
You think so?

Ahahahaha!
That's a good one!
translation:
Legend Tamer huh?
You truly are amazing!
I wonder if the Tamers here could
achieve such a feat if they tried?
You think so?

Ahahahaha!
That's a good one!

original:
You defeated the Selectors?
That's incredible!
Not to mention you rescued the
kidnapped Tamers and Digimon!
I'm in shock! Truly I am!
translation:
You defeated the Selectors?
That's incredible!
Not to mention you rescued the
kidnapped Tamers and Digimon!
I'm in shock! Truly I am!

original:
I had no idea you'd manage to 
defeat the Selectors on your own.
I don't think anyone believed such
a thing was possible.
translation:
I had no idea you'd manage to 
defeat the Selectors on your own.
I don't think anyone believed such
a thing was possible.

original:
I heard that you'd become a 
Legendary Tamer.
And that you'd gone and become
a star in the sky.
But of course a story like that 
can't be true, can it?
Such a rank actually exists?
Huh...
translation:
I heard that you'd become a 
Legendary Tamer.
And that you'd gone and become
a star in the sky.
But of course a story like that 
can't be true, can it?
Such a rank actually exists?
Huh...

original:
...You really defeated the
Selectors? By yourself...?
Sorry, but that didn't happen.
It's simply impossible.
I'm not saying I don't believe you,
but...
I just don't want to hear such an
incredible story...
translation:
...You really defeated the
Selectors? By yourself...?
Sorry, but that didn't happen.
It's simply impossible.
I'm not saying I don't believe you,
but...
I just don't want to hear such an
incredible story...

original:
You're always doing all sorts of
things all by yourself.
For that, I'm grateful to you...
.........
In that case, I guess we're not 
really needed, are we?
translation:
You're always doing all sorts of
things all by yourself.
For that, I'm grateful to you...
.........
In that case, I guess we're not 
really needed, are we?

original:
Legend Tamer, you say?
Hmmm...
How does it feel to be unrivaled in
the Digital World?
Do you feel all-powerful?

Or do you feel like it's no big deal?

I guess we can't understand.
We're not you, after all.
translation:
Legend Tamer, you say?
Hmmm...
How does it feel to be unrivaled in
the Digital World?
Do you feel all-powerful?

Or do you feel like it's no big deal?

I guess we can't understand.
We're not you, after all.

original:
Is it really true that you defeated
the Selectors all by yourself?
There's no way you could come
out of that unscathed...
And yet here you are...

Is this what it means to be a
Platinum Tamer?
Hmmm...
translation:
Is it really true that you defeated
the Selectors all by yourself?
There's no way you could come
out of that unscathed...
And yet here you are...

Is this what it means to be a
Platinum Tamer?
Hmmm...

original:
About that rumor of you defeating
the Selectors...
So that wasn't a joke after all, huh.
translation:
About that rumor of you defeating
the Selectors...
So that wasn't a joke after all, huh.

original:
Legend Tamer?
I've heard that somewhere...
Wait, you're the one who became
the Legend Tamer?
.........
.........
Huh...
translation:
Legend Tamer?
I've heard that somewhere...
Wait, you're the one who became
the Legend Tamer?
.........
.........
Huh...

original:
You defeat the Selectors?!
I see! Great job!
You really are incredible!
Nothing to sneeze at indeed!
You even went and rescued all
those who were kidnapped, huh?!
I see... Everyone's glad that they
chose to believe in you!
We're so thankful you've been 
here for us!
translation:
You defeat the Selectors?!
I see! Great job!
You really are incredible!
Nothing to sneeze at indeed!
You even went and rescued all
those who were kidnapped, huh?!
I see... Everyone's glad that they
chose to believe in you!
We're so thankful you've been 
here for us!

original:
I know I've said this many times,
but you're truly incredible!
Wonderful, powerful, you're an
amazing person!
I can't help but feel proud of you,
despite not knowing you!
translation:
I know I've said this many times,
but you're truly incredible!
Wonderful, powerful, you're an
amazing person!
I can't help but feel proud of you,
despite not knowing you!

original:
You became a Legend Tamer?
That's great!
That's a Tamer Rank I haven't
heard much about, but...
It must be a pretty major step
up, since it's you receiving it!
So of course I'm gonna 
congratulate you, ^P!
translation:
You became a Legend Tamer?
That's great!
That's a Tamer Rank I haven't
heard much about, but...
It must be a pretty major step
up, since it's you receiving it!
So of course I'm gonna 
congratulate you, ^P!

original:
I heard the rumor about you
defeating the Selectors...
But to think you did such a thing
all by yourself...
Hmmm... Well, it's certainly 
something I'm grateful to you for...
But coming from me, it just sounds
like a terrible joke...
translation:
I heard the rumor about you
defeating the Selectors...
But to think you did such a thing
all by yourself...
Hmmm... Well, it's certainly 
something I'm grateful to you for...
But coming from me, it just sounds
like a terrible joke...

original:
I was pretty rude to you before,
wasn't I?
I really must thank you for saving
the Digital World.
Me, as well as everyone else...
We're all thankful.
translation:
I was pretty rude to you before,
wasn't I?
I really must thank you for saving
the Digital World.
Me, as well as everyone else...
We're all thankful.

original:
You ranked up to Legend Tamer?!

Well, I guess its not that surprising
considering it's you after all...
But why you...
I just don't get it at all.
translation:
You ranked up to Legend Tamer?!

Well, I guess its not that surprising
considering it's you after all...
But why you...
I just don't get it at all.

original:
Ahahaha... So you're saying you're
some super Tamer who
managed to beat the Selectors
AND save everyone??
Bwahahaha! What's up with that?!
That's ridiculous!
You think I'd just stand here in
shock and awe hearing that??
Keh... Hahahaha!
Don't make me laugh!
I'm not jealous at all!
Not one bit!
translation:
Ahahaha... So you're saying you're
some super Tamer who
managed to beat the Selectors
AND save everyone??
Bwahahaha! What's up with that?!
That's ridiculous!
You think I'd just stand here in
shock and awe hearing that??
Keh... Hahahaha!
Don't make me laugh!
I'm not jealous at all!
Not one bit!

original:
So you're gonna go to the 
Colosseum and get Legend Rank?
Now now now! Aren't you already
a legend?? Isn't that enough?!
If you keep annoying me like this,
I'm gonna explode!
translation:
So you're gonna go to the 
Colosseum and get Legend Rank?
Now now now! Aren't you already
a legend?? Isn't that enough?!
If you keep annoying me like this,
I'm gonna explode!

original:
Legend Tamer, huh?
I'm happy for you.
C...congratulations...
Congra... tulations...
Congratulations, Congratulations, 
Congratulations, Congratulations.
.........
translation:
Legend Tamer, huh?
I'm happy for you.
C...congratulations...
Congra... tulations...
Congratulations, Congratulations, 
Congratulations, Congratulations.
.........

original:
If it isn't ^P. There's 
rumors abound about you right now.
A hero who saved the world all on
their own, they say!
When I heard that, I can't say I
was surprised.
Thank you for everything.
translation:
If it isn't ^P. There's 
rumors abound about you right now.
A hero who saved the world all on
their own, they say!
When I heard that, I can't say I
was surprised.
Thank you for everything.

original:
I hear you're aiming for Legend
Tamer rank, now...?
When I think about what it means 
to be a legend in this world...
Aren't you already basically a
Legendary Tamer?
translation:
I hear you're aiming for Legend
Tamer rank, now...?
When I think about what it means 
to be a legend in this world...
Aren't you already basically a
Legendary Tamer?

original:
I see you've finally become a true,
genuine Legend Tamer!
But to tell you the truth...

You became a legend to this town
a long time ago already♪
translation:
I see you've finally become a true,
genuine Legend Tamer!
But to tell you the truth...

You became a legend to this town
a long time ago already♪

original:
Oh, ^P!
Great job out there!
Defeating the Selectors, causing 
the Erasers to disappear,
Not to mention both Tamers and
Digimon
are beginning to return to where
they belong!
I really must thank you for 
everything, ^P.
I'm so glad you came to the
Digital World.
translation:
Oh, ^P!
Great job out there!
Defeating the Selectors, causing 
the Erasers to disappear,
Not to mention both Tamers and
Digimon
are beginning to return to where
they belong!
I really must thank you for 
everything, ^P.
I'm so glad you came to the
Digital World.

original:
If it isn't the Super Tamer who
defeated the Selectors all alone.
Just as I predicted.
It was more than just luck.
You won using your own strength!
translation:
If it isn't the Super Tamer who
defeated the Selectors all alone.
Just as I predicted.
It was more than just luck.
You won using your own strength!

original:
Who're you gonna beat next?
There's no one left, right?
...Huh? There's a Legend Tamer
rank battle at the Colosseum...?
I guess in that case your enemies
will be legendary.
translation:
Who're you gonna beat next?
There's no one left, right?
...Huh? There's a Legend Tamer
rank battle at the Colosseum...?
I guess in that case your enemies
will be legendary.

original:
What the? You're already a 
Legend Tamer?
I guess that was expected, 
considering it's you.
...Good job, ^P.
translation:
What the? You're already a 
Legend Tamer?
I guess that was expected, 
considering it's you.
...Good job, ^P.

original:
Thank you for defeating the
Selectors, ^P.
Did those kidnapped from the
colosseum return, too?
Really? I'm glad...
translation:
Thank you for defeating the
Selectors, ^P.
Did those kidnapped from the
colosseum return, too?
Really? I'm glad...

original:
You saved someone precious to
me...
Someone that means more than
the world to me.
An old friend of mine who was
kidnapped by the Selectors...
Back when I was a diligent young
Tamer.
translation:
You saved someone precious to
me...
Someone that means more than
the world to me.
An old friend of mine who was
kidnapped by the Selectors...
Back when I was a diligent young
Tamer.

original:
Legend Tamer...?

That means you can't possibly
go any higher, right?
That's great news!
Just you wait, ^P!
I'll do my best to catch up to you,
and maybe one day...!
...Just joking!

But I'd like to go back to trying
my best again.
Thank you for motivating me, 
^P♪
translation:
Legend Tamer...?

That means you can't possibly
go any higher, right?
That's great news!
Just you wait, ^P!
I'll do my best to catch up to you,
and maybe one day...!
...Just joking!

But I'd like to go back to trying
my best again.
Thank you for motivating me, 
^P♪

original:
.........
.........
I did say "Go beat the Selectors!"
before, didn't I?
Something about "Please go and
rescue everyone!"...
But to think you actually did it,
all by yourself...
How in the world did you do that?
translation:
.........
.........
I did say "Go beat the Selectors!"
before, didn't I?
Something about "Please go and
rescue everyone!"...
But to think you actually did it,
all by yourself...
How in the world did you do that?

original:
Everytime I hear stories about
your struggles...
I can't help but feel jealous!

So just quit it already!
If you don't...
I'm gonna start rolling on the floor
and crying!
translation:
Everytime I hear stories about
your struggles...
I can't help but feel jealous!

So just quit it already!
If you don't...
I'm gonna start rolling on the floor
and crying!

original:
Shut it! I don't wanna hear about
you ranking up again!
I don't have the patience to hear
about your antics anymore!
translation:
Shut it! I don't wanna hear about
you ranking up again!
I don't have the patience to hear
about your antics anymore!
